main.description: I am a aspiring Software Engineer, with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, scripting, and automation. I am motivated by my passion for learning new technologies and perfecting my craft. I will never shy away from a challenge and I will always approach tasks with a positive attitude and a willingness to collaborate, explain, and take criticism to continue to improve.
main.bio: Completed more than 20+ various projects related to embedded systems, machine learning, and data analysis. Including created a hardware prototype, a smart door lock system using RFID, a portable IoT-based prototype, a firefighter robot prototype, a web application, a firmware for a microcontroller. Also, created a machine learning model for vehicle registration plate detection, lung cancer cell detection, image noise reduction. And performed data analysis for market-based analysis, customer segmentation, customer churn prediction, credit risk analysis, business decision research, and data analysis for COVID19 in Indonesia, ASEAN, and the world.

education.description2: Thesis : Telecontrol Implementation Of Hexapod Spy Robot Movement Using Wifi Based On Web Server

patens.description: Wahyu Andhyka Kusuma, Diah Risqiwati, Evi Dwi Wahyuni, Lailatul Husniah, Izzan Silmi Aziz, Ghufron Wahyu Kurniawan dan Abdul Sukron.2017. SAVE (Survival Vest for Mountaineer). EC00201700017.

work.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
work.description: Used more than 1000 tabular data for the dataset.
work.description2: Utilized Pandas, Numpy, and Mito to preprocess the tabular data for a cleaner dataset.
work.description3: Utilized Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch and Scikit-learn to train the model with the machine learning / deep learning algorithm for covid-19 detection.
work.description4: Utilized MLFlow to manage the model for deploying into production.
work.description5: Built a dekstop application GUI with PySide6 for interaction with the model.
work.description6: Google Colaboratory, Matplotlib, Pandas, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, PySide6, Numpy, Mito, Pandas Profiling, Seaborn, Bokeh, Plotly, Keras, PyTorch, MLFlow, Apache Superset, Google Data Studio, PowerBi, Tableau, Scipy, OpenCV, Git.
work.description7: Built API for the microcontroller to send the sensors data to the database.
work.description8: Utilized MongoDB to capture the sensors data.
work.description9: Utilized NodeJS to integrate API for the sensors data.
work.description10: Developed a web-dashboard with VueJS for interaction the sensors data.
work.description11: Implemented CI/CD to manage the code for deploying into production.
work.description12: ESP32, ArduinoIDE, HTTP, MongoDB, NodeJS, VueJS, Jest, GCP, AWS, Netlify, Git

work.title: Data & Machine Learning Engineer
work.description: Used more than 600 images for the dataset.
work.description2: Utilized OpenCV to preprocess the images for a cleaner dataset.
work.description3: Utilized TensorFlow to train the model with the convolution neural network algorithm for lung cancer cell detection.
work.description4: Utilized Scikit-learn to validate the model for measuring accuracy, and it reaches 96%.
work.description5: Built a web-based GUI with Flask for interaction with the model.
work.description6: Google Colaboratory, Matplotlib, Pandas, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Flask and OpenCV.
work.description8: Utilized OpenCV to preprocess the images for a cleaner dataset.
work.description9: Utilized Gaussian noise to add noise to the images.
work.description10: Implemented three denoise algorithms (mean, median, wiener) to compare for obtaining the best result.
work.description11: Obtained accurate result with the mean algorithm as the error rate is the smallest.
work.description12: Jupyter Notebook, Matplotlib, Pandas, Keras, Scipy, and OpenCV
